items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages appear in the chat window within 1 second of being sent
Messages are delivered in correct chronological order
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the recipient
non_functional: System must handle at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds
Call quality remains stable with less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video streaming technology

notes: Assumed that the application will support both web and mobile platforms; group video calls and file sharing are not explicitly requested but may be considered in future.
